goals__remit: Vinces is a Government and Corporate Affairs Consultancy that builds social legitimacy of corporate interests through an integrated methodology. Our mission is to help our clients build their legitimacy and reputation through a proprietary method with transparency and integrity. Vinces’s approach is based on what Vinces calls the Representation Pyramid, according to the following fundamental principle: “the stronger the social legitimacy, the greater the ability to influence politics and policy.
relevant_communication: Since the launching of the office in Brussels Vinces is organizing a series of events on the topic of shifting power in Europe, a phenomenon we are exploring through three angles according to the Vinces methodology: politics, regulation, and society.
